property.name: hawq_master_address_host
property.description: The host name of hawq master.

property.name: hawq_standby_address_host
property.description: The host name of hawq standby master.

property.name: hawq_master_temp_directory
property.description: The temporary directory reserved for hawq master.

property.name: hawq_segment_temp_directory
property.description: The temporary directory reserved for hawq segment.

property.name: hawq_global_rm_type
property.description: The resource manager type to start for allocating resource. 'none' means hawq resource manager exclusively uses whole cluster; 'yarn' means hawq resource manager contacts YARN resource manager to negotiate resource.

property.name: hawq_rm_memory_limit_perseg
property.description: The limit of memory usage in a hawq segment when hawq_global_rm_type is set 'none'.

property.name: hawq_rm_nvcore_limit_perseg
property.description: The limit of virtual core usage in a hawq segment when hawq_global_rm_type is set 'none'.

property.name: hawq_rm_yarn_address
property.description: The address of YARN resource manager server.

property.name: hawq_rm_yarn_scheduler_address
property.description: The address of YARN scheduler server.

property.name: hawq_rm_yarn_queue_name
property.description: The YARN queue name to register hawq resource manager.

property.name: hawq_rm_yarn_app_name
property.description: The application name to register hawq resource manager in YARN.

property.name: hawq_re_cpu_enable
property.description: The control to enable/disable CPU resource enforcement.

property.name: hawq_re_cgroup_mount_point
property.description: The mount point of CGroup file system for resource enforcement. For example, /sys/fs/cgroup/cpu/hawq for CPU sub-system.

property.name: hawq_re_cgroup_hierarchy_name
property.description: The name of the hierarchy to accomodate CGroup directories/files for resource enforcement. For example, /sys/fs/cgroup/cpu/hawq for CPU sub-system.
